fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource

Class ManagerResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource.ManagerResource

  • public class ManagerResource
extends Object
    Download manager - controls the download queue. Downloads and caches files. All methods are static. It has to be initialized with init( Context ) before using.
    Author:
    Olgierd Uzieblo

        pMemoryLimitHigh - High memory limit to use (kB).

      • isInternalMemoryLow

        public static boolean isInternalMemoryLow()
        Checks if we have low internal memory - data should be saved on sd card.
        Returns:
        True if we have low memory - there is less internal memory than sMemoryLimitHigh.

      • isOutOfInternalMemory

        public static boolean isOutOfInternalMemory()
        Checks if we are out of internal memory - data MUST be saved on sd card only.
        Returns:
        True if we are out of internal memory - there is less internal memory than sMemoryLimitLow.

      • isFileAvailable

        public static boolean isFileAvailable(String pName)
        Checks if this file exists and can be opened. File can not be opened if it is stored on SD card that is not accessible!
        Parameters:
        pName - File name.
        Returns:
        True if file is available.

      • getFullFilePath

        public static String getFullFilePath(String pFileName)
        Gets full file path to chosen file. This path will be different depending on file location - it can be in internal memory or on sd card.
        Parameters:
        pFileName - File name.
        Returns:
        Full path leading to this file or null if this file is not available!

        pStorageType - Type of storage.
        pFileSize - Size of this file.

        Gets missing resource image as Drawable. Returns null if it was not initialized.
        Returns:
        Drawable that should be used if image is missing.

                            List<MemorySlot> pMemorySlots)
        Saves data in external storage in "cache" folder.
        Parameters:
        pFileName - File name to use.
        pMemorySlots - ArrayList with MemorySlots containing downloaded data.
        Returns:
        True if data was saved correctly.

      • getNextTask

        public static DownloadTask getNextTask(int pTaskType)
        Gets next waiting task. High priority tasks are returned first. Other tasks are returned later.
        Parameters:
        Type - of task to get - large or small file.
        Returns:
        Next DownloadTask or null if there are no tasks left.

      • isTaskAlreadyExisting

        public static boolean isTaskAlreadyExisting(DownloadTask pTask)
        Checks if there is already the same task in download queue.
        Parameters:
        pTask - DownloadTask to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if there is already a task for the same resource and listener.

      • isFileInTaskQueue

        public static boolean isFileInTaskQueue(ResourceDescriptor pResource)
        Checks if task queue contains task with chosen file name.
        Parameters:
        pResource - ResourceDescriptor of file to check for.
        Returns:
        True if there is a task for this file already.

      • addTasks

        public static boolean addTasks(ResourceDescriptor[] pResourceDescriptors,
               int pPriority,
               IDownloadFinishedListener pListener)
        Creates and adds multiple tasks to the downloading queue.
        Parameters:
        pResourceDescriptors - Resource descriptors array.
        pPriority - Priority that will be set for all those tasks.
        pListener - IDownloadFinishedListener for those
        Returns:
        True if at least one task was added, false it nothing was added.

      • addTasks

        public static boolean addTasks(ResourceDescriptor[] pResourceDescriptors,
               int pPriority,
               IDownloadFinishedListener pListener,
               int pTaskTypeFile)
        Creates and adds multiple tasks to the downloading queue.
        Parameters:
        pResourceDescriptors - Resource descriptors array.
        pPriority - Priority that will be set for all those tasks.
        pListener - IDownloadFinishedListener for those
        pTastTypeFile - File type eg. TASK_TYPE_SMALL_FILE
        Returns:
        True if at least one task was added, false it nothing was added.

      • addTasks

        public static boolean addTasks(ResourceDescriptor[] pResourceDescriptors,
               int pPriority,
               IDownloadFinishedListener pListener,
               IFileChecker pChecker,
               int pTaskType,
               IFileCrypter pFileCrypter,
               IURLCreator pURLCreator)
        Creates and adds multiple tasks to the downloading queue.
        Parameters:
        pResourceDescriptors - Resource descriptors array.
        pPriority - Priority that will be set for all those tasks.
        pListener - IDownloadFinishedListener for those tasks.
        pChecker - Custom file checker for those tasks.
        pTaskType - Type of task - small or large file.
        pFileCrypter - Optional file crypter.
        pURLCreator - Optional url creator.
        Returns:
        True if at least one task was added, false it nothing was added.

      • addTask

        public static boolean addTask(DownloadTask pTask)
        Adds again an already created task.
        Parameters:
        pTask - DownloadTask instance.
        Returns:
        True if it was added correctly.

      • addTask

        public static boolean addTask(ResourceDescriptor pResourceDescriptor,
              int pPriority,
              IDownloadFinishedListener pListener)
        Creates and adds one tasks to the downloading queue.
        Parameters:
        pResourceDescriptor - Resource descriptor.
        pPriority - Priority of this task.
        pListener - DownloadFinishedListener for this task.
        pIsLowPriority - True sets task to low priority.
        Returns:
        True if at least one task was added, false it nothing was added.

      • addTask

        public static boolean addTask(ResourceDescriptor pResourceDescriptor,
              int pPriority,
              IDownloadFinishedListener pListener,
              IFileChecker pChecker,
              int pTaskType,
              IFileCrypter pFileCrypter,
              IURLCreator pURLCreator,
              Object pTag)
        Creates and adds one tasks to the downloading queue.
        Parameters:
        pResourceDescriptor - Resource descriptor.
        pPriority - Priority of this task.
        pListener - DownloadFinishedListener for this task.
        pIsLowPriority - True sets task to low priority.
        pChecker - Custom file checked for those tasks.
        pTaskType - Task type - small or large file.
        pFileCrypter - Optional file crypter.
        pURLCreator - Optional URL creator.
        pTag - Optional tag object.
        Returns:
        True if at least one task was added, false it nothing was added.

        Gets file content as byte array.
        Parameters:
        pFileName - Filename of an existing file.
        Returns:
        File content or null if file does not exits.

        Returns:

      • getScaledBitmap

        public static Bitmap getScaledBitmap(String pFilename,
                     int pDesiredWidth,
                     int pDesiredHeight)
        Gets image from resource, scales it down maintaining aspect ratio and returns as a new Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        pFilename - File name (without path).
        pDesiredWidth - Desired maximum width of the image.
        pDesiredHeight - Desired maximum height of the image.
        Returns:
        New Bitmap or null if it was impossible to create it (missing image).

      • getScaledBitmapDrawable

        public static BitmapDrawable getScaledBitmapDrawable(String pFilename,
                                     int pDesiredWidth,
                                     int pDesiredHeight)
        Gets image from resource, scales it down maintaining aspect ratio and returns as a new BitmapDrawable.
        Parameters:
        pFilename - File name (without path).
        pDesiredWidth - Desired maximum width of the image.
        pDesiredHeight - Desired maximum height of the image.
        Returns:
        New BitmapDrawable or null if it was impossible to create it (missing image).

      • saveImageToStorage

        public static void saveImageToStorage(Bitmap pBitmap,
                      String pFileName)
        Saves Bitmap to Storage depending which is available firstly trying to save on External one
        Parameters:
        pBitmap - Bitmap to save
        pFileName - Bitmap name to use

      • saveImageToStorage

        public static void saveImageToStorage(Drawable pDrawable,
                      String pFileName)
        Saves Drawable to Storage depending which is available firstly trying to save on External one
        Parameters:
        pDrawable - Drawable to save
        pFileName - Drawable name to use

      • saveDataToExternalStorage

        public static boolean saveDataToExternalStorage(byte[] pData,
                                String pFileName,
                                String pDestinationFolderName)
        Saves data to external storage in specified folder and file.
        Parameters:
        pData - Byte array with data to save.
        pFileName - Desired file name.
        pDestinationFolderName - Name of destination folder where the file will be saved (for example "Images").
        Returns:
        True if everything is ok, false otherwise.

        Gets total size of downloaded files.
        Returns:

      • getDownloadTime

        public static long getDownloadTime()
        Gets total time spent on downloading.
        Returns:
        Total time spent in ms.

      • getAverageDownloadSpeed

        public static int getAverageDownloadSpeed()
        Gets average download speed in bytes per second.
        Returns:
        Average download speed.

      • isBusy

        public static boolean isBusy()
        Checks if ResourceManager is busy with any tasks.
        Returns:
        True if there is work to do.

      • isBusy

        public static boolean isBusy(IDownloadFinishedListener pListener)
        Checks if ResourceManager is busy with tasks of specific DownloadFinishedListener.
        Parameters:
        pListener - DownloadFinishedListener to check for.
        Returns:
        True if ResourceManager is downloading something for this DownloadFinishedListener.

      • checkTasks

        public static void checkTasks(IDownloadFinishedListener pListener)
        Checks if there are any other tasks left for chosen listener. Finishes the download if there is nothing. Launched every time a task is finished.
        Parameters:
        pListener - IDownloadFinishedListener belonging to task that has just been finished.

      • freeMemory

        public static void freeMemory()
        Frees memory buffers in DownloadThread.
